topic_list.topic: Group mates self-introduction and the project introduction
Discussion about favourite animal characteristics and the workflow

tokenized_answer: The project manager introduced the upcoming project to the team members and then the team members participated in an exercise in which they drew their favorite animal and discussed what they liked about the animal.
The project manager talked about the project finances and selling prices.
The team then discussed various features to consider in making the remote.
The industrial designer will work on the working design of the remote.
The user interface designer will work on the technical functions of the remote.
The marketing executive will work on what requirements the remote has to fulfill
The remote will sell for 25 Euro.
The remote will be sold on an international scale.
The production costs cannot exceed 12.50 Euro.
Whether the remote will be used exclusively for televisions.

specific_query_list.answer: Industrial Designer drew a whale because whales came in and went to eat everything in sight, and they were harmless, interesting, and mild. Project Manager drew a dog because the dogs were friendly and cheery. Next, about the finance and the workflow. specific_query_list.answer: Project manager mentioned that they had no background information on the competitor, however, they could analyze based on the product price.
